chapter.title: Utilities
chapter.sect1: Database Printout The print-mdb.sh script can be used to obtain a textual printout of the database. The script has no option.

Simple Parameter Extractor The simple-parameter-extractor.sh script can be used to extract parameters in tabular form. The source of data can be eithter the hrdp-replay-server or directly files in pacts format. It does not require a Yamcs server running.
Please launch the script without any option to get usage information

CIS Raw Packet Dump The cis-raw-packet-dump.sh script can be used to retrieva parameters from a CIS server (that is either Yamcs or CD-MCS CIS). It takes a list of packet ops-names as argument and prints the received telemetry packets in hexadecimal form. When connected to the Yamcs server, it is just another client and the Yamcs Monitor can be used to create new channels or to assign it to existing channels.
Please launch the script without any option to get usage information

HRDP Raw Packet Dump The hrdp-raw-packet-dump.sh script can be used to perform telemetry dumps directly from the hrdp archive. It connects and performs requests directly to the hrdp replay server.
Please launch the script without any option to get usage information
